movie.title: Miraculous Virgin
movie.description_intro: A group of artists meets a beautiful and mysterious woman called Anabella, and all of them experience passion, dreams and get inspired by her.
movie.description_full: A group of artists meets a beautiful and mysterious woman called Anabella, and all of them experience passion, dreams and get inspired by her.

movies.title: Marguerite
movies.summary: Paris, 1920s. Marguerite Dumont is a wealthy woman, lover of the music and the opera. She loves to sing for her friends, although she's not a good singer. Both her friends and her husband have kept her fantasy. The problem begins when she decides to perform in front of a real audience.

movies.title: Bounty Hunters
movies.summary: It is the story of five bounty hunters who chase fugitives for money in China, Hong Kong, Korea and Thailand.
movies.description_full: It is the story of five bounty hunters who chase fugitives for money in China, Hong Kong, Korea and Thailand.
movies.synopsis: It is the story of five bounty hunters who chase fugitives for money in China, Hong Kong, Korea and Thailand.

movies.title: Dodgeball
movies.summary: White Goodman (Ben Stiller) is the owner and founder of Globo Gym, and would love nothing more than owning Average Joe's Gymnasium. Peter LaFleur (Vince Vaughn) doesn't want to lose his gym to Goodman, but can't find a way to get $50,000 in time. Peter and his gang of gym buddies think of ways to raise money, finally settling on winning a dodge ball tournament. White Goodman retaliates by creating his own dodge ball team to finish off Peter. Peter's team doesn't do too well, until legendary ADAA champ Patches O'Houlihan (Rip Torn) turns up ready to train them.
